engine.component

Class MouseMoveControlComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.component.Component
      • engine.component.MouseMoveControlComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseListener

    public abstract class MouseMoveControlComponent
extends Component
implements MouseListener
    Specifies a component that will listen to mouse input.
    Author:
    Marco
